Name: Smoked Gun
About the game: Smoked Gun - is a hardcore 3D shooter with surviving elements done as DOOM, where you will have to fight against the whole criminal world alone, against mafia. You are an ex-police officer who fought with evil many times. But the story has changed. You have been a trouble for a local mafia for a long time. The criminals decided to pay you and stole your closest people-your family. The only way to get back them is to do everything for saving family. The main aim in the game is looking for any guns, ammos, first aid kits. The most important thing is to survive in unstoppable shoots. Be careful! With every new level you will meet more and more enemies who have different damage, different health quantity but donâ€™t be scared. A plenty of various guns in the game will help you to fight against enemies and win in the war. Think of your every step and you will find the mafia boss. Remember, you have only one life to prevent such terrible battle and survive.
